name: ffp-generate
description: JavaScript browser module to generate `ffp` landscapes

scripts.start: microbundle watch -f umd -o example --target browser --compress false & light-server -s example -p 8080 -w example/**/*
scripts.build: microbundle -f es,cjs --external all && microbundle -f umd --target browser
scripts.deploy: microbundle -f umd -o example --target browser --compress false && ghp example --force
scripts.preversion: npm run build && git add dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && yarn deploy

author: Arnaud Juracek <arnaud@chevalvert.fr>
